Text:
will this work the "ali213 " version?
cannot seem to access it in game.
sure wish they would fix this , comments not showing issue.
well it isn,t working in the ali213 version only thing showing there is uniforms
if u still cant play the dlc RMJ13 email me at cyborg_5742@yahoo.co.uk i'll tell u how to play with the ali213 version

Not worth it. It's through and through just more content - though don't expect anything storywise other than fill-ins for the gaps in the original campaign. Which I personally never felt were there and these fill-ins are nothing but excuses for more combat. Then again, it's an action game, if you enjoyed it's action so much you haven't had enough by the end of it, then by all means - you get to drive a tank (yes, it does smash buildings in its path!)
